name: Necrosphere
description: A full-blown adventure played with only two buttons. Become the recently deceased agent Terry Cooper and escape the underworld while facing the toughest, meanest and most difficult obstacles ever devised.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 or late Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 700 MB available space
